SCTX:
Begin strongholdServices

;script on all the people in your stronghold to give them unique greetings without extra typing

short strongService
short noLore

if ( strongService != 1 )
	set strongService to 1
endif

if ( Stronghold < 2 )
	
	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		disable
	endif
	
else

	if ( GetDisabled == 1 )
		enable
	endif	

endif

End
